item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Pick a statement that reflects something you believe. This assignment might be slightly easier if it is a statement that not everyone believes, but it will work fine either way. It should be something that you want to think more about, and maybe a statement for which the justification is not obvious. The statement will function as the conclusion of three arguments you will create, following the instructions below. So, after you’ve picked a statement, do each of the following:
